ticket.title: HttpMock not initialized in the Rails 2.3.2 GEM
ticket.original-body:
I am receiving the following error on any of my Rails projects on OSX with the Rails 2.3.2 GEM.
NameError: uninitialized constant ActiveResource::HttpMock
This can be reproduced by just opening a console as follows:
script/console Loading development environment (Rails 2.3.2) >> ActiveResource => ActiveResource >> ActiveResource::HttpMock NameError: uninitialized constant ActiveResource::HttpMock from /Library/Ruby/Gems/1.8/gems/activesupport-2.3.2/lib/active_support/dependencies.rb:440:in `load_missing_constant' from /Library/Ruby/Gems/1.8/gems/activesupport-2.3.2/lib/active_support/dependencies.rb:80:in `const_missing_not_from_s3_library' from /Library/Ruby/Gems/1.8/gems/aws-s3-0.5.1/lib/aws/s3/extensions.rb:174:in `const_missing' from (irb):2
Thanks, Tom
ticket.latest-body:
I am receiving the following error on any of my Rails projects on OSX with the Rails 2.3.2 GEM.
NameError: uninitialized constant ActiveResource::HttpMock
This can be reproduced by just opening a console as follows:
script/console Loading development environment (Rails 2.3.2) >> ActiveResource => ActiveResource >> ActiveResource::HttpMock NameError: uninitialized constant ActiveResource::HttpMock from /Library/Ruby/Gems/1.8/gems/activesupport-2.3.2/lib/active_support/dependencies.rb:440:in `load_missing_constant' from /Library/Ruby/Gems/1.8/gems/activesupport-2.3.2/lib/active_support/dependencies.rb:80:in `const_missing_not_from_s3_library' from /Library/Ruby/Gems/1.8/gems/aws-s3-0.5.1/lib/aws/s3/extensions.rb:174:in `const_missing' from (irb):2
Thanks, Tom
ticket.original-body-html:
I am receiving the following error on any of my Rails projects on OSX with the Rails 2.3.2 GEM.

NameError: uninitialized constant ActiveResource::HttpMock

This can be reproduced by just opening a console as follows:

script/console Loading development environment (Rails 2.3.2)

ActiveResource => ActiveResource ActiveResource::HttpMock NameError: uninitialized constant ActiveResource::HttpMock

from /Library/Ruby/Gems/1.8/gems/activesupport-2.3.2/lib/active_support/dependencies.rb:440:in `load_missing_constant'
from /Library/Ruby/Gems/1.8/gems/activesupport-2.3.2/lib/active_support/dependencies.rb:80:in `const_missing_not_from_s3_library'
from /Library/Ruby/Gems/1.8/gems/aws-s3-0.5.1/lib/aws/s3/extensions.rb:174:in `const_missing'
from (irb):2

Thanks, Tom

version.body:
I am receiving the following error on any of my Rails projects on OSX with the Rails 2.3.2 GEM.
@@@ NameError: uninitialized constant ActiveResource::HttpMock @@@
This can be reproduced by just opening a console as follows:
@@@ script/console Loading development environment (Rails 2.3.2) >> ActiveResource => ActiveResource >> ActiveResource::HttpMock NameError: uninitialized constant ActiveResource::HttpMock from /Library/Ruby/Gems/1.8/gems/activesupport-2.3.2/lib/active_support/dependencies.rb:440:in `load_missing_constant' from /Library/Ruby/Gems/1.8/gems/activesupport-2.3.2/lib/active_support/dependencies.rb:80:in `const_missing_not_from_s3_library' from /Library/Ruby/Gems/1.8/gems/aws-s3-0.5.1/lib/aws/s3/extensions.rb:174:in `const_missing' from (irb):2 @@@
Thanks, Tom
version.body-html:
I am receiving the following error on any of my Rails projects on OSX with the Rails 2.3.2 GEM.

NameError: uninitialized constant ActiveResource::HttpMock

This can be reproduced by just opening a console as follows:

script/console
Loading development environment (Rails 2.3.2)
>> ActiveResource
=> ActiveResource
>> ActiveResource::HttpMock
NameError: uninitialized constant ActiveResource::HttpMock
    from /Library/Ruby/Gems/1.8/gems/activesupport-2.3.2/lib/active_support/dependencies.rb:440:in `load_missing_constant'
    from /Library/Ruby/Gems/1.8/gems/activesupport-2.3.2/lib/active_support/dependencies.rb:80:in `const_missing_not_from_s3_library'
    from /Library/Ruby/Gems/1.8/gems/aws-s3-0.5.1/lib/aws/s3/extensions.rb:174:in `const_missing'
    from (irb):2

Thanks,
Tom
version.title: HttpMock not initialized in the Rails 2.3.2 GEM

version.body: Try updating your `aws-s3` gem. The most recent version is 0.6.2.
version.body-html: Try updating your aws-s3 gem. The most recent version is 0.6.2.
version.title: HttpMock not initialized in the Rails 2.3.2 GEM

version.body:
I just updated my aws-s3 gem, but no joy:
>> ActiveResource::HttpMock NameError: uninitialized constant ActiveResource::HttpMock from /Library/Ruby/Gems/1.8/gems/activesupport-2.3.2/lib/active_support/dependencies.rb:440:in `load_missing_constant' from /Library/Ruby/Gems/1.8/gems/activesupport-2.3.2/lib/active_support/dependencies.rb:80:in `const_missing_not_from_s3_library' from /Library/Ruby/Gems/1.8/gems/aws-s3-0.6.2/lib/aws/s3/extensions.rb:206:in `const_missing' from (irb):1
Is there a reason the traceback is referencing the aws-s3 gem?
version.body-html:
I just updated my aws-s3 gem, but no joy:

ActiveResource::HttpMock NameError: uninitialized constant ActiveResource::HttpMock

from /Library/Ruby/Gems/1.8/gems/activesupport-2.3.2/lib/active_support/dependencies.rb:440:in `load_missing_constant'
from /Library/Ruby/Gems/1.8/gems/activesupport-2.3.2/lib/active_support/dependencies.rb:80:in `const_missing_not_from_s3_library'
from /Library/Ruby/Gems/1.8/gems/aws-s3-0.6.2/lib/aws/s3/extensions.rb:206:in `const_missing'
from (irb):1

Is there a reason the traceback is referencing the aws-s3 gem?
version.title: HttpMock not initialized in the Rails 2.3.2 GEM

version.body:
I went ahead and uninstalled the aws-s3 gem totally just to see if it made a difference. I get the same error though:
@@@ >> ActiveResource::HttpMock NameError: uninitialized constant ActiveResource::HttpMock from /Library/Ruby/Gems/1.8/gems/activesupport-2.3.2/lib/active_support/dependencies.rb:440:in `load_missing_constant' from /Library/Ruby/Gems/1.8/gems/activesupport-2.3.2/lib/active_support/dependencies.rb:80:in `const_missing' from (irb):1 @@@
version.body-html:
I went ahead and uninstalled the aws-s3 gem totally just to see if it made a difference. I get the same error though:

>> ActiveResource::HttpMock
NameError: uninitialized constant ActiveResource::HttpMock
    from /Library/Ruby/Gems/1.8/gems/activesupport-2.3.2/lib/active_support/dependencies.rb:440:in `load_missing_constant'
    from /Library/Ruby/Gems/1.8/gems/activesupport-2.3.2/lib/active_support/dependencies.rb:80:in `const_missing'
    from (irb):1
version.title: HttpMock not initialized in the Rails 2.3.2 GEM

version.body:
Okay, so I need to add the line:
@@@ require 'active_resource/http_mock' @@@
That is probably just poorly documented and not a bug. Sorry!
version.body-html:
Okay, so I need to add the line:

require 'active_resource/http_mock'

That is probably just poorly documented and not a bug. Sorry!
